title: My Teacher
subtle: Descriptive (fiction), 45 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: What makes a good teacher? My Teacher is a colorful and simple story that looks at many of the qualities of wonderful teachers in classrooms around the world. Repetitive text and detailed illustrations support emerging readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of periods.
meta: caring, creative, helpful, interesting, smart, talented
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high frequency words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
